tool.name: amiRNA design with WMD3

param.name: gene_list
param.label: amiRNA target sequence name(s) (Separated with commas without space, for example, AT1G74280.1,AT1G74290.1,AT1G74300.1)

param.name: min_number_targets
param.label: At least how many of the given sequence names need to be targeted

param.name: offtarget_list
param.label: List of acceptable offtargets (gene names as defined in transcript library)

param.name: genome
param.label: Transcript library to search
param.help: Default is wheat IWGSC v1.1 (gene names has 02G), where the gene names are different from v1.0 (gene name is 01G): TraesCS1B02G018700 vs. TraesCS1B01G018700
